summary: This bill, H.R. 1580, amends section 3001 of title 39 of the United States Code. It mandates that all mail solicitations for goods or services be clearly labeled as such, using conspicuous and legible text. The Postal Service is granted the authority to create regulations regarding the specific wording and format of the notice, ensuring recipients can readily identify solicitation mail. The bill does exclude some matter from this requirement that is described in subsection (d).
